short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Say goodbye to annoying safe redirects, and enjoy smoother access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
现在很多站点在访问站外地址时会出现安全跳转，非常浪费时间。 😞 😞 😞。 该扩展可以跳过安全拦截，快速访问目标网址。 💐 💐 💐。

Nowadays, many websites implement security redirects when accessing external addresses, which is very time-consuming.  This extension can bypass security interception and quickly access the target URL. 

 🚀 特点 Features
1. 支持地址配置。
Supports address configuration.

2. 支持主题配置。
Supports theme configuration.

 🏖 使用方法 How to Use
1. 当在某个站点出现安全跳转时，点击扩展图标，然后页面右侧会弹窗扩展页面。
When a security redirect occurs on a site, click the extension icon, and a pop-up page will appear on the right side of the page.

2. 点击创建按钮，出现弹出框。
Click the "Create" button to open a pop-up box.

3. 在弹出框输入当前网站地址（通常不需要填写，有默认值）。
Enter the current website address in the pop-up box (usually, no need to fill it in as there is a default value).

4. 在弹窗框输入重定向参数名，可观察地址栏（如果是 target 或者 url 会自动填写）。
Enter the redirection parameter name in the pop-up box, which can be observed in the address bar (if it is 'target' or 'url', it will be filled in automatically).

5. 保存，刷新页面即可。
Save, refresh the page, and it’s done.


🐛🐛🐛 如果有新的功能需求或者错误报告，欢迎在 github issues 模块进行反馈。
If you have new feature requests or bug reports, feel free to provide feedback through the GitHub issues module.
